PrimaryCategoryName: Clothing, Shoes & Accessories:Women's Handbags & Bags:Briefcases & Laptop Bags
Description: Tony Perotti Bella Fellini Double Compartment Leather Laptop Briefcase in Black The Bella Fellini Double Compartment Leather Laptop Briefcase is our most popular women’s briefcase. Stylish, unique and pleasantly functional—this bag is ideal for the professional woman that has a need for a briefcase that can keep up with the daily hustle and bustle. Laptop compatible up to 17”. This bag has two spacious compartments; the front compartment features three business and credit card holders, two pen holders, and three large organizational pockets. Rear compartment features padded laptop sleeve with adjustable Velcro safe strap. Easy to grasp top padded double handles, comes in 1” thick detachable and adjustable padded shoulder strap. Dimensions: Exterior: 16.5”(L) x 11.5”(H) x 5”(W). Interior: 15.5”(L) x 10”(H) x 1.75”(W)- each compartment. The Bella Fellini Double Compartment Leather Laptop Briefcase is part of our Tony Perotti Italico leather collection, made from Italian adult Bull hide Full Grain leather, providing a durable, stronger and longer lasting leather that is smooth to the touch with a shiny glossed finish. The cool Italian weather prevents any flea or tick irritation to the animals attributing to the top quality and purity of the leather, devoid of any scratches or bites on the leather. Tanned in a heavy coating of different eco-friendly vegetable oils to prevent everyday scratches and blemishes, the natural surface of our full grain leather burnishes and beautifies over time. Our Italico collection products come in a signature plaid interior lining for added style and fashion.Our Tony Perotti products are backed by a limited lifetime warranty. Please contact the Distributor Tony Perotti USA. Made from Full Grain Italian Bull Hide Leather. Vegetable tanned for greater durability, texture and feel. Leather is smooth to the touch with a shiny glossed finish. Laptop Compatible up to 17". Interior front compartment features three(3) business and credit card holders, two(2) pen holders, two(2) stationary organizational pouches, and two(2) large organizational pouches. Rear interior compartment features a padded sleeve pocket with adjustable velcro safe strap for your laptop. Easy to grasp double top handles. Interior Pigskin lining. Bottom feet for protection. Comes with 1" thick detachable and adjustable padded shoulder strap. Comes in signature Tony Perotti lint bag for storage. Dimensions: Exterior: 16.5”(L) x 11.5”(H) x 5”(W). Interior: 15.5”(L) x 10”(H) x 1.75”(W)- each compartment. Weight: 5lbs. Comes with Limited Lifetime Warranty. Return Policy We accept returns and exchanges within 30 days of your order date. Please contact us in order to receive an RMA and a return address. Please allow up to 7 days from the day that we receive the return for the refund to be reflected on your account. For exchanges- please contact us with the item you would like to exchange it to in order for us to confirm its availability. Shipping Free Shipping - We offer free economy shipping on all of our products. If you choose free shipping, the item will ship via the most economical shipping method available, whether it's UPS or USPS. International Shipments Most international shipments are shipped via USPS (UPS is available to Canada as well). Please allow plenty of time for the item to arrive as shipping times vary due to customs and many other factors. Please also note that the import duties, taxes and other charges are not included in the item price and are the buyer's responsibility. Store Policy Positive Feedback and Service - our number one goal is to exceed your expectations. We pride ourselves in excellent customer service and try to treat our customer the way we want to be treated. If you experience any problems with your order or product, please contact us via email or phone. We will do everything we can in order to improve your experience with us. Sales Tax - we collect sales tax for the residents of GA- 7% Payment - Please pay with PayPal. This is the most secure and reliable method of payment Item Condition - All items are brand new with original tags, unless specifically stated otherwise Contact Us - please don't hesitate to contact us with any questions or concerns you might have. You can reach us by phone or through the ebay messaging system. We we will do our best to accommodate any special orders and requests. Embossing Personalize you item for free! We offer free embossing on most of our products. All you need to do is send us the initials you want after the completion of your order. The font for all briefcases, luggage and handbags is Times New Roman size 28". The font for all wallets and smaller items is Times New Roman 14". We can also emboss company logos and other symbols for a fee- please contact us for details. Please note: embossing may take up to three additional business days. Embossed items cannot be return for any reason.
